rationale: The segment describes securing vaccine doses but contains no intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.

rationale: The segment does not contain high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, intensifiers, or critical alert phrases.
statement_text: The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.
